text: qyl lha: adkhuli alqsr, wakan shnh min zujaj tahtah ma', falamaa ra'ath znth ma'an tataradad amwajh, wakashafat ean saqayha ltkhwd alma', faqal laha slyman: 'iinah shn amls min zujaj saf walma' thth. fadrkt ezmt malak slyman, wqalt: rabi 'iiniy zalamt nafsi bima kunt ealayh min alshrk, wanqdt mutabaeat lisulayman dakhlt fi din rabu alealamin ajmeyn
